title: Automation
description: I am a hude advocate for infrastructure automation & continuous integration as this allows developers to focus on innovating new features and solving new problems rather than been backlogged with maintaining existing infrastructure. In this project I made ansible playbooks and bash scripts to automate the setup of Linux & Mac OS X. In addition to this I also setup an Azure pipeline YAML linter to run on PRs to ensure that any new features added contain no errors.

title: Personal Site (This one!)
description: This is a project I've worked on since I started learning web development. It has been through many iterations (css to scss, scss to styled components, Vanilla JS to React & React to Gatsby to name a few..) and it has helped me challenge myself & learn a lot about various web technologies in general. I really enjoy spending time improving this site and thinking of new features I can add.

title: Drink Recipe App
description: In this project I made a drink recipe app using React hooks & SASS. It pulls data from the CocktailDB API which returns instructions on how to make various drinks. This was one of the first projects I converted over to React;

title: Unsplash Image App
description: In this project I made a site that calls the Unsplash API to display pictures from Unsplash. I used React router, hooks, the unsplash-js library & styled-components in this project.
